word_mean: 芫荽，胡荽：伞形科植物芫荽(Coriandrum sativum)的干熟果实

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French coriandre, from Latin coriandrum, from Greek koriannon

entry.def: Coriander is a plant with seeds that are used as a spice and leaves that are used as a herb.

means.word_mean: 1. Old World herb with aromatic leaves and seed resembling parsley
2. dried coriander seeds used whole or ground
3. parsley-like herb used as seasoning or garnish
